Interface Summarizer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, Pluggable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSummarizer, LuceneSummarizer

    public interface Summarizer
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, Pluggable
    Extension point for summarizer.
    Author:
    Jérôme Charron

        Summary getSummary(java.lang.String text,

        Get a summary for a specified text.
        Parameters:
        text - is the text to summarize.
